info.title: ORSCF VisitData-StoreAccess API
info.description: stores data for research study related visits

post.summary: Loads a specific DataRecording addressed by the given primary identifier. Returns null on failure, or if no record exists with the given identity.

GetDataRecordingByTaskGuidRequest.description:
Contains arguments for calling 'GetDataRecordingByTaskGuid'.
Method: Loads a specific DataRecording addressed by the given primary identifier. Returns null on failure, or if no record exists with the given identity.

taskGuid.description: Required Argument for 'GetDataRecordingByTaskGuid' (Guid): a global unique id of a concrete study-task execution which is usually originated at the primary CRF or study management system ('SMS')
a global unique id of a concrete study-task execution which is usually originated at the primary CRF or study management system ('SMS')

visitGuid.description: the guid of the visit in which this task was executed

dataRecordingName.description: unique invariant name of ths task-procedure as defined in the 'StudyWorkflowDefinition' (originated from the sponsor)

taskExecutionTitle.description: title of the task execution as defined in the 'StudyWorkflowDefinition' (originated from the sponsor)

scheduledDateTimeUtc.description: the estimated date when the visit is scheduled *this field is optional

executionDateTimeUtc.description: the real time, when the data was recorded *this field is optional

dataSchemaUrl.description: schema-url of the data which were stored inside of the 'RecordedData' field

recordedData.description: RAW data, in the schema as defined at the 'DataSchemaUrl'

notesRegardingOutcome.description: additional notes regarding this dedcated execution (supplied by the execution person) *this field is optional (use null as value)

extendedMetaData.description: optional structure (in JSON-format) containing additional metadata regarding this record, which can be used by 'StudyExecutionSystems' to extend the schema

executingPerson.description: *this field is optional (use null as value)

GetDataRecordingByTaskGuidResponse.description:
Contains results from calling 'GetDataRecordingByTaskGuid'.
Method: Loads a specific DataRecording addressed by the given primary identifier. Returns null on failure, or if no record exists with the given identity.

fault.description: This field contains error text equivalent to an Exception message! (note that only 'fault' XOR 'return' can have a value != null)

GetDataRecordingsRequest.description:
Contains arguments for calling 'GetDataRecordings'.
Method: Loads DataRecordings.

page.description: Optional Argument for 'GetDataRecordings' (Int32?): Number of the page, which should be returned

pageSize.description: Optional Argument for 'GetDataRecordings' (Int32?): Max count of DataRecordings which should be returned

GetDataRecordingsResponse.description:
Contains results from calling 'GetDataRecordings'.
Method: Loads DataRecordings.

fault.description: This field contains error text equivalent to an Exception message! (note that only 'fault' XOR 'return' can have a value != null)

SearchDataRecordingsRequest.description:
Contains arguments for calling 'SearchDataRecordings'.
Method: Loads DataRecordings where values matching to the given filterExpression

filterExpression.description: Required Argument for 'SearchDataRecordings' (String): a filter expression like '((FieldName1 == "ABC" && FieldName2 > 12) || FieldName2 != "")'

sortingExpression.description: Optional Argument for 'SearchDataRecordings' (String): one or more property names which are used as sort order (before pagination)

page.description: Optional Argument for 'SearchDataRecordings' (Int32?): Number of the page, which should be returned

pageSize.description: Optional Argument for 'SearchDataRecordings' (Int32?): Max count of DataRecordings which should be returned

SearchDataRecordingsResponse.description:
Contains results from calling 'SearchDataRecordings'.
Method: Loads DataRecordings where values matching to the given filterExpression

fault.description: This field contains error text equivalent to an Exception message! (note that only 'fault' XOR 'return' can have a value != null)

GetDrugApplymentByTaskGuidRequest.description:
Contains arguments for calling 'GetDrugApplymentByTaskGuid'.
Method: Loads a specific DrugApplyment addressed by the given primary identifier. Returns null on failure, or if no record exists with the given identity.

taskGuid.description: Required Argument for 'GetDrugApplymentByTaskGuid' (Guid): a global unique id of a concrete study-task execution which is usually originated at the primary CRF or study management system ('SMS')
a global unique id of a concrete study-task execution which is usually originated at the primary CRF or study management system ('SMS')

visitGuid.description: the guid of the visit in which this task was executed

drugApplymentName.description: unique invariant name of the study itself as defined in the 'StudyWorkflowDefinition' (originated from the sponsor)

taskExecutionTitle.description: title of the task execution as defined in the 'StudyWorkflowDefinition' (originated from the sponsor)

scheduledDateTimeUtc.description: the estimated time when the drug applyment is scheduled *this field is optional

executionDateTimeUtc.description: the real date, when the visits was executed *this field is optional

drugDoseMgPerUnitMg.description: dose (mg) which is inside of one unit

notesRegardingOutcome.description: additional notes regarding this dedcated execution (supplied by the execution person) *this field is optional (use null as value)

extendedMetaData.description: optional structure (in JSON-format) containing additional metadata regarding this record, which can be used by 'StudyExecutionSystems' to extend the schema

executingPerson.description: *this field is optional (use null as value)

GetStudyEventByEventGuidRequest.description:
Contains arguments for calling 'GetStudyEventByEventGuid'.
Method: Loads a specific StudyEvent addressed by the given primary identifier. Returns null on failure, or if no record exists with the given identity.

eventGuid.description: Required Argument for 'GetStudyEventByEventGuid' (Guid): a global unique id of a concrete study-event occurrence which is usually originated at the primary CRF or study management system ('SMS')
a global unique id of a concrete study-event occurrence which is usually originated at the primary CRF or study management system ('SMS')

participantIdentifier.description: identity of the patient which can be a randomization or screening number (the exact semantic is defined per study)

studyExecutionIdentifier.description: a global unique id of a concrete study execution (dedicated to a concrete institute) which is usually originated at the primary CRF or study management system ('SMS')

studyEventName.description: unique invariant name of the event as defined in the 'StudyWorkflowDefinition' (originated from the sponsor)

extendedMetaData.description: optional structure (in JSON-format) containing additional metadata regarding this record, which can be used by 'StudyExecutionSystems' to extend the schema *this field is optional (use null as value)

additionalNotes.description: additional notes (supplied by the execution person) *this field is optional (use null as value)

GetStudyExecutionScopeByStudyExecutionId.description:
Contains arguments for calling 'GetStudyExecutionScopeByStudyExecutionIdentifier'.
Method: Loads a specific StudyExecutionScope addressed by the given primary identifier. Returns null on failure, or if no record exists with the given identity.

studyExecutionIdentifier.description: Required Argument for 'GetStudyExecutionScopeByStudyExecutionIdentifier' (Guid): a global unique id of a concrete study execution (dedicated to a concrete institute) which is usually originated at the primary CRF or study management system ('SMS')
a global unique id of a concrete study execution (dedicated to a concrete institute) which is usually originated at the primary CRF or study management system ('SMS')

executingInstituteIdentifier.description: the institute which is executing the study (this should be an invariant technical representation of the company name or a guid)

studyWorkflowName.description: the official invariant name of the study as given by the sponsor *this field has a max length of 100

studyWorkflowVersion.description: version of the workflow *this field has a max length of 20

extendedMetaData.description: optional structure (in JSON-format) containing additional metadata regarding this record, which can be used by 'StudyExecutionSystems' to extend the schema *this field is optional (use null as value)

Method: Loads a specific Treatment addressed by the given primary identifier. Returns null on failure, or if no record exists with the given identity.

a global unique id of a concrete study-task execution which is usually originated at the primary CRF or study management system ('SMS')

visitGuid.description: the guid of the visit in which this task was executed

treatmentName.description: unique invariant name of ths task-procedure as defined in the 'StudyWorkflowDefinition' (originated from the sponsor)

taskExecutionTitle.description: title of the task execution as defined in the 'StudyWorkflowDefinition' (originated from the sponsor)

scheduledDateTimeUtc.description: the estimated time when the treatment is scheduled *this field is optional

executionDateTimeUtc.description: the real time, when the treatment was executed *this field is optional

notesRegardingOutcome.description: additional notes regarding this dedcated execution (supplied by the execution person) *this field is optional (use null as value)

extendedMetaData.description: optional structure of additional metadata regarding this record in JSON-format, which can be used by study execution systems to extend the schema

executingPerson.description: *this field is optional (use null as value)
